sentence.Network_en: The aggression of a bully leaves people feeling hurt, angry and impotent.
sentence.Network_cn: 暴徒的侵犯令人们感到痛心、愤怒却又无能为力。

sentence.Network_en: They sit in impotent opposition while the country goes to the dogs.
sentence.Network_cn: 国家败落之际，他们加入了软弱无力的反对党。

sentence.Network_en: Without the chairman's support, the committee is impotent.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有主席的支持，委员会是无能为力的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(67) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... impotency 无力 impotent 虚弱的 impound 收押.
词根及词缀 ... potential n 潜力（由“能力”引申为“潜力”） impotent a 无力的 approachable 易接近的.
...民部律师将过去独断独行、有如沙皇般的移民部形容为「软弱无力」(impotent)，也难令人信服。
by working inside surface of the heel , you could make someone impotent or give them a migraine headache .按摩脚后跟内侧可以让人浑身无力或者偏头痛。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin impotent- 'powerless', from in- 'not' + potent- (see potent)

entry.tran: 无能为力的;不起作用的
entry.def: If someone feels impotent, they feel that they have no power to influence people or events.

example.ex: The aggression of a bully leaves people feeling hurt, angry and impotent...
example.tran: 暴徒的侵犯令人们感到痛心、愤怒却又无能为力。

example.ex: In impotent rage he got up and stalked up and down the flat.
example.tran: 他怒气冲冲地站起来,却又无计可施，只能在公寓里走来走去。

entry.def: If a man is impotent, he is unable to have sex normally, because his penis fails to get hard or stay hard.

sentences.sentence: "Technology without morality is barbarous; morality without technology is impotent"- Freeman J.Dyson

auth_sentence.content: It's the most impotent feeling in the world.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's the most impotent feeling in the world.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's the most impotent feeling in the world.

auth_sentence.content: I am impotent, incontinent and have chronic abdominal pain.
auth_sentence.res_content: I am impotent, incontinent and have chronic abdominal pain.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I am impotent, incontinent and have chronic abdominal pain.

auth_sentence.content: Her voice...quavered like the voice of an old, impotent woman.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her voice...quavered like the voice of an old, impotent woman.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her voice...quavered like the voice of an old, impotent woman.

stems_affixes.word_buile: potent[adj.强有力的]+ial……的→adj.潜在的,可能的 n.潜能,潜力
potent[adj.强有力的]+ial……的→adj.潜在的,可能的 n.潜能,潜力

means.word_mean: 不能采取有效行动的, 无能为力的

sentences.en: They were virtually impotent against the power of the large companies.
sentences.cn: 他们实际上无力与实力雄厚的大公司抗衡。

sentences.en: We felt quite impotent to resist the will of the dictator.
sentences.cn: 我们感到无力抗拒独裁者的意志。

means.word_mean: 阳痿的, 不能达到性高潮的
